quest0.title: Analyze Your Surroundings
quest0.description: Use the ls command to analyze your surroundings by listing all of the contents of the current directory.

quest1.title: Explore the Environment
quest1.description: Use the cd DIRECTORY_NAME command to explore the environment by changing the current directory. Make sure to replace DIRECTORY_NAME with the actual name of the directory you want to explore.

quest2.title: Determine Your Location
quest2.description: Use the pwd command to determine your location by printing the current directory's path.

quest3.title: Retrace Your Steps
quest3.description: Use the history command to view the history of the commands you have previously used.

quest4.title: Construct a Building
quest4.description: Use the mkdir DIRECTORY_NAME command to create a new directory. Make sure to replace DIRECTORY_NAME with the actual name of the directory you want to construct.

quest5.title: Demolish a Building or Room
quest5.description: Use the rm NAME command to delete files or directories. Make sure to replace NAME with the actual name of the file or directory you want to demolish.

quest6.title: Enter a Room
quest6.description: Use the cat FILE_NAME command to display the contents of a file. Make sure to replace FILE_NAME with the actual name of the file you want to enter.

quest7.title: Construct a Room
quest7.description: Use the touch FILE_NAME command to create a new file. Make sure to replace FILE_NAME with the actual name of the file you want to construct.
